# Nowa Wieś, Gmina Wartkowice

Nowa Wieś  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Wartkowice, within Poddębice County, Łódź Voivodeship, in central Poland. It lies approximately  south of Wartkowice,  north-east of Poddębice, and  north-west of the regional capital Łódź.
